description: Time snapshot was taken, in Epoch milliseconds. Same across all rows and all tables in the snapshot, and uniquely defines a particular snapshot.
name: snapshot_timestamp
creator_id
description: FK into user table for user who created this dataset

name: includes_all_participants
description: If true, this dataset contains data from all participants available instead a single cohort..

name: last_modified_time
description: Last user-visible modification to the dataset

name: name
description: User-provided name for this Dataset. Unique within the owning workspace.

name: workspace_id
description: ID of workspace containing this dataset. FK into workspace table.
